inlineContent.text: Use style manager to dynamically modify the map style. You can manage layers, sources, lights, terrain, and many more.
Typically, you don’t create the style manager instances yourself. Instead you receive instance of this class from
property, or create an instance of
allows not only load the style, but also modify the style configuration, for more information, see
should only be used from the main thread.
